query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chapter_feedback' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chapter%'; SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chapter_highlights' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chapter%'; SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chapter_bookmarks' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chapter%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4S4NaSTm8gULMAn.ab4bddc10a61 --database fsRnWghWhaoD2r3KXXoRti --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chapter_feedback' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chapter%'; SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chapter_highlights' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chapter%'; SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'chapter_bookmarks' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%chapter%';
